verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The dawn breaks boldly o'er the land
And God's new day is born,
Revealing Sons who love their God,
Who bring the kingdom forth.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Sons of God stand at Thy throne.
A nation worships Thee.
O, holy people, Israel
Shall rule eternally.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
O, Lamb of God whose blood has cleansed
And purified the hearts
Of those who stood with Thee as one
Those chosen from the start

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
A chosen race of kings and priests
Remind You of your Word.
That You shall have a righteous Bride,
That's holy, true, and sure.
